constituent: reign, water, water droplets, water pistol, pedestal, elbow, mouth
koohiiStory1: Build a moat around your pedestal to protect your reign of power.
koohiiStory2: From his water pedestal Neptune reigns over his Sea Empire.
kunYomi: おさ.める、おさ.まる、なお.る、なお.す
myStory: trị. cai quản. điều trị. nước và đài để điều trị
readingExamples: 政治 (せいじ), 療治 (りょうじ), 治まる (おさ.まる), 治める (おさ.める), 治す (なお.す), 治る (なお.る)
words: to be at peace, to clamp down, to lessen (storm terror anger)
